name: CHRONIC_MEDS
description: This table stores chronic medication information of a problem.

columns.name: PROBLEM_LIST_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the problem record.

columns.name: CHRON_MED_ID
columns.description: The chronic medication ID associated with a problem.

columns.name: CHRON_MED_STRT_DATE
columns.description: The start date of the chronic medication.

columns.name: CHRON_MED_END_DATE
columns.description: The end date of the chronic medication.

columns.name: PRESCRIBING_DOCT_ID
columns.description: The ID of the doctor prescribing the medication.

columns.name: CHRONIC_AILMENT_C_NAME
columns.description: The chronic ailment of the medication.

columns.name: QUANTITY_PER_MONTH
columns.description: The quantity of the medication per month.

columns.name: INITIAL_COST_OF_MED
columns.description: The initial cost of the medication.

columns.name: APPLICATION_NUMBER
columns.description: The application number of the chronic medication.

columns.name: PRESCRIPTION_NUMBER
columns.description: The prescription number of the chronic medication.

columns.name: ORIGINAL_PRESCRI_YN
columns.description: Flag indicates if this is the original prescription of the chronic medication.

columns.name: CHRON_MED_EFF_DATE
columns.description: Specifies the chronic meds effective date.
